easy.q: I have keys but cannot open locks. I tell you a tune when you press me. What am I?
easy.hint: Black and white and make music.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?

hard.q: A box holds a secret. Inside it sits a number that doubles when you add the square of 1 and the cube of 1. What is the smallest possible number that fits this riddle?
hard.hint: Consider simple powers and how they scale.
